e: ￹`Ma~`tawa~ `kako~ `a~ `mi~`tengil~ `to~ `sowal~ `nira~.￺I laughed as I listened to what he said.￻我聽到他的話就笑了
￹`Paka~`tawa~`en~ `kami~.￺Make us laugh. / Give us a good time.￻逗我們笑
￹`Ana:~ `a~ `ma~`tawa~ `ci~`~ `Satan~.￺Watch out or Satan will get to laugh.￻小心，撒旦會嘲笑
￹`O~ `maan~ `ko~ `ka~`tawa~`an~ `namo~ `a~ `sowal~?￺What are you laughing about?￻你們在笑什麼？
d.f: ￹￺generic for laugh with positive and negative meanings￻笑的總稱，含有肯定與否定的意義
